SmarTrace Chain tracing program developed to extract persistence lengths from AFM images of filaments such as collagen and DNA. Can be used on any type of image with bright chain-like structures on a darker background. Naghmeh Rezaei, Nancy Forde https://github.com/FordeLab/SmarTrace https://github.com/FordeLab/SmarTrace/blob/main/README.md MatLab
TopoStats An AFM image analysis program to batch process data by removing artefacts, identifying objects, and obtaining and plotting their statistics. TopoStats Developers https://github.com/AFM-SPM/TopoStats https://afm-spm.github.io/TopoStats/ https://afm-spm.github.io/TopoStats/ https://pypi.org/project/topostats/ Python LGPL Linux Windows macOS
